description: Try our easy to follow Latina Fresh Ricotta & Spinach Agnolotti With Sun-Dried Tomato Sauce & Mushrooms recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stuffed pasta,High fibre,High protein,Spring,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar,Spinach,Mushroom
name: Latina Fresh Ricotta & Spinach Agnolotti With Sun-Dried Tomato Sauce & Mushrooms Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425g Latina Fresh creamy sun-dried tomato sauce
0.5 cup Mil Lel Grated Parmesan (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook Latina Fresh Ricotta & Spinach Agnolotti in a large pot of boiling water for 5 minutes or until tender. Drain.
Meanwhile, heat a generous splash of olive oil and a little butter in a large deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook mushrooms for 5-6 minutes or until tender and lightly browned.
Add Latina Fresh creamy sun-dried tomato sauce to the pan and cook for 3 minutes or until simmering.
Toss pasta into the sauce with the rocket and mix until combined. Serve scattered with parmesan
